subject: Re: regex for matching repeated strings
body:
yitzle wrote:
> Issues with both methods:
> 
> John's doesn't work for this data:
> aaaaaa
> aaaaaa
> bbb
> cccccc
> cccccc
> 
> I would expect:
> aaaaaa
> bbb
> cccccc
> 
> I would get:
> aaaaaa
> bbb
> cccccc
> cccccc

It works for me:

$ perl -le'
my $data = q[aaaaaa
aaaaaa
bbb
cccccc
cccccc
];
print $data;
$data =~ s/(.*\n)(?=\1)//g;
print $data;
'
aaaaaa
aaaaaa
bbb
cccccc
cccccc

aaaaaa
bbb
cccccc




John
